test/cpp/end2end/end2end_test.cc:1635: Failure
      Expected: s.error_message()
      Which is: "Connect Failed"
To be equal to: grpc::string("Getting metadata from plugin failed with error: ") + kTestCredsPluginErrorMsg
      Which is: "Getting metadata from plugin failed with error: Could not find plugin metadata."
The current failures are of the type https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/c9f3ad6c-0e92-4d71-9f58-0d696121a3ad/targets/%2F%2Ftest%2Fcpp%2Fend2end:end2end_test@poller%3Depoll1/log
